title: Kimi No Gin No Ashi
alternative_title: Je Zilveren Voeten ; Your Silver Leg ; 君の銀のあし
status: Je Zilveren Voeten ; Your Silver Leg ; 君の銀のあし
description:
Description :
        "We're running the same course, so become my lover."   A lone traveler, Susumu, aimlessly drops into a sports bar. On the huge monitor, he sees a dashing snowboarder with a prosthetic limb gliding over a snowy mountain. He blurts out "So cool…", and the man beside him excitedly says "That's me!"   The energetic man, Tobias, and Susumu have a wonderful night together. Could there be more in store for them?    Mysterious Japanese traveler, Susumu  X  Dutch Para Snowboarder with a prosthetic leg, Tobias

chapters.chapter_name: Chapter 5: Monopoly [Keep Him All To Myself]
